text:
It's a bummer, but we (HubSpot) had to pause on it this year. We have some big developer-related projects (relaunch docs, redesign the websites, build a local dev workflow, etc.) that we need to focus on ... and events are a LOT of work.

We'll pick it up again next year... maybe even do something in Q1 or Q2 of next year.
BUT - A number of community developers are talking about self-organizing a meetup or workshop during INBOUND. I would follow <#CCGU4R4ER|extend> for details. :slightly_smiling_face:

If interested in having a Developer Day event at Inbound this year - a group of us in the community are trying to organize the event if you’re interested in volunteering or even sponsoring check out our google doc we’re using for coordination, we’re also in <#CCGU4R4ER|extend>

<https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PAB5YF25BA4nsPEnu01TCWxMCRpBWEJSHtqA12JTtf4/edit#>
Fingers crossed I can convince my new employer to send me down
let me know if you need me to talk to them

just making sure you get pinged <@UB690RZA7> since you were interested - we’re discussing it in that channel like Luke said, as well as we have a google doc for coordinating it set up <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PAB5YF25BA4nsPEnu01TCWxMCRpBWEJSHtqA12JTtf4/edit#>
thanks <@U7SL518D6>, i'll check it out. i'm hoping to attend or at least send a member from our dev team. :+1::skin-tone-3:
Real genius. When was the last time you saw that movie?
